Happy Monday Baystate Families,
We are entering the last 6 days of school. It is important that you finish strong. The last day to submit assignments is June 22, 2020. Summer school starts July 6, 2020 form 8:00am - 2:00pm. Good Morning Baystate Families,
We hope you and your family are well in this time of change and unrest. As the world embarks upon a time uncertainty and truth, know that our virtual doors are open. We will be discussing the current state of our nation with staff and students this week. Stay safe and be well. Remember we will get through this together! #silenceimpliesconsent
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Buenos d√≠as familias de Baystate,

post_text:
Greetings Baystate Academy Parents,
Governor Baker has closed all Massachusetts schools for the remainder of the year. We will continue remote learning and send additional information regarding grading policies and promotions guidelines. Please continue to work hard and stay safe. If you are still in need of technology please send an email to Ms. Lewis or Ms. Johana.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Saludos Padres de la Academia Baystate,
El gobernador Baker ha cerrado todas las escuelas de Massachusetts por el resto del a√±o. Continuaremos el aprendizaje remoto y enviaremos informaci√≥n adicional sobre las pol√≠ticas de calificaci√≥n y las pautas de promociones. Contin√∫a trabajando duro y mantente seguro. Si todav√≠a necesita tecnolog√≠a, env√≠e un correo electr√≥nico a la Sra. Lewis o la Sra. Johana.

Happy Sunday Baystate Families,
I hope you are doing well. Monday we will host our first virtual family bingo night. If you would like to participate please complete the below survey. Prizes will be provided. Also, an update on week 4 of remote learning will be sent to parents this evening. Never forget the power of family! We miss you all!

https://forms.gle/1dNWZpfBoq53isuW6
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Happy Sunday Baystate Families,

post_text: Baystate Academy hosted it's first-ever College Instant Acceptance Week. 9 Colleges interviewed seniors and provided onsite acceptances. As of today, the Class of 2020 has been offered 1,280,000 in scholarship money for the 4-year duration. Giving us a grand total of $4,145,200 in awarded scholarship money. Thank you Elms College STCC Western New England University American International College Bay Path University Framingham State University Pine Manor College Universal Technical InstituteSalem State University Holyoke Community College

post_text:
Baystate Academy's athletic department has partnered with Springfield College to counsel and develop the mental side of sports for our athletes. This dynamic team will be providing a series of leadership and team building workshops for our scholars to expose them to how positive leaders act and lead on and off the court.

In these photos BACPS athletes are working in collaborative groups to identifying key words that describe their idea of leader in themselves and their teammates. #baystateacademy #baystatebulls
#wearecrew #eleducation #bacpsbasketball #bacpsathletics #springfieldcollege

post_text:
We are committed to raise funds in celebration of the 24th annual Rays of Hope ‚Äì Walk & Run Toward the Cure of Breast Cancer.

Rays of Hope supports research at the Rays of Hope Center for Breast Cancer Research, treatment programs and services through the Baystate Health Breast Network, outreach and education and awards grants to support complementary therapies throughout western Massachusetts.

We can‚Äôt do this alone ‚Äì we need your help to reach our fundraising goal. There is strength in numbers and together we can make a difference. All funds raised remain local.

Please make a contribution toward my goal in support of such an outstanding organization. Your donation is fully tax-deductible.

Thank you!

ttp://bayhf.convio.net/site/TR/Events/General?team_id=5566&pg=team&fr_id=1121
